data.title: Web Design & Hosting Services in Massachusetts
data.meta_description: Ashdown Technologies is a Family Owned Web Design and Hosting Company. We provide a solution-based service for your business. Call us today at 508-476-3200
data.text:
Ashdown Technologies Web Design & Hosting Services

Web Development

We have over 40 years of combined web page development experience and we speak HTML, CSS, PHP, Javascript and SQL fluently. With this depth of knowledge we can handle any web site design you have in mind, whether simple or complex. Learn More

Full Service

We do it all. Our on-site Network Operations Center can host your web site, web storage, virtual server and more. But best of all, you can talk to real people who know their stuff and speak a language you can understand!

Learn More

WordPress

Sites developed using WordPress are powerful and affordable; and we know WordPress. Thousands of existing plug-ins will differentiate your site from the rest. Need a special plug-in? We can create that too. Let us show you our WordPress skills!

Learn More

Responsive Design

We design sites that work gracefully on devices from Smart Phones to Desktops, and all those in between. We can make your web site look good no matter how your customers choose to view it. Today, a site that works on mobile devices is a must.

Learn More

Virtual Services

Server virtualization has many benefits. Virtual servers requires less hardware, less power and utilize resources to the fullest, thus reducing operational costs. If you are interested in virtualization, you owe it to yourself to contact us and learn more.

Learn More



Contact Us Today!

Why Choose Us?

There are many companies out there offering website design and development, so what makes us different? Here are some of the reasons:

Over 29 years in the business

Competent developers knowledgeable in a wide range of technologies, including HTML, CSS, PHP, JavaScript, jQuery and SQL

Real and capable people at the other end of the telephone

Our own on-site Network Operations Center to host your website, with single source responsibility to ensure maximum website availability

High-end Graphics Designers to make your website pop

Technicians skilled at making the complex simple to understand

But don’t take our word for it. See what our customers are saying about us below.

Testimonials

Thank you so much for all of your terrific work. You are a pleasure to work with.

Kristin B.FPA MA

We’ve used Ashdown for over 21 years to host our websites, handle all our email needs, provide off-site backups and do occasional IT projects. In all that time I can’t recall a single significant glitch – they’ve always completed work quickly and well, and with notable courtesy. I’d recommend Ashdown Technologies to a friend, without hesitation.

Mike CharterisGeneral ManagerStannah Stairlifts Inc.

We have been working with Ashdown for over 27 years. They developed our web site, host it and provide all technical assistance we have required throughout this period. We have found them very responsive and knowledgeable in regards to all areas of web design, development while providing excellent follow up support. They are considered an integral part of our team.

Bill BoucherPresidentBerkshire Electronics, Inc

I’ve been working with Ashdown Technologies Inc. (and the company which evolved to become Ashdown) since 1995, which means more than 29 years. I think that says it all. One thing that makes them stand out and above any other hosting company is their customer support. Due to my profession, I’ve come to know some of the most customer-support oriented companies (and some which left a lot to be desired, in this field). Ashdown tops them all, they have the best customer support in this business.

John C.OwnerM1911.ORG

Milford Water Company has been using the services of Ashdown Technologies for approximately 22 years and over that time their service and support has been wonderful. Most recently they undertook a complete re-design of our company web page which had become outdated and not very user friendly. Ashdown with its vast technical knowledge and experience in web design proved to be invaluable throughout the entire process. Milford Water Company has recommend Colin and his team to other affiliated companies and has heard nothing but positive feedback and would strongly recommend them to anyone.

David L. CondreyGeneral ManagerMilford Water Company

At Zeppotech (formerly ehomewatch) we design, build, and test internet-connected product concepts for home monitoring and residential community security. Over 23 years, we have worked with Ashdown and its predecessors for email and web hosting to support ‘real’ and ‘prototype’ projects. To us, the value of Ashdown is simple — security, knowledge, and PERSONAL support. When we call, we call a person, BY NAME, who we know we can trust because he has been there for the duration, and because we know he will personally follow through.

Wayne LilleyOwnerZeppotech (formerly ehomewatch, Nemo Software)

The team at Ashdown did everything we asked for, and guided us through the entire process.We use Ashdown for email, they built our website, they host the site, and they are always there to answer our many questions, and fast to fix our mishaps.Sales team is up to date on all forms of internet traffic, as well as techniques to enhance your presence in the digital arena.We have used Ashdown since 2010 and will continue to benefit from their vast technological knowledge base for the foreseeable future.Great company, competitive pricing, AWESOME SERVICE!

John WhitePresidentPro Tech Pest Control

I’ve been with Ashdown for many years with several sites. They are always very responsive, ready with solutions and provides a stable site.

Larry RaffCopley Raff Inc.

I have been in the tech business since 1981 and in 2000 was very fortunate to learn about Lightband Technologies – soon to become Ashdown Technologies. Our business required web hosting with database functions for customer interactions along with a robust and reliable email service. Over these many years we have dealt with many tech companies along with their customer support staff. Don Olson of Ashdown Technology is the VERY BEST technical and support person we ever had and is an important part of our success and growth because of his reliable presence and expertise, I couldn’t image running our business without knowing Don was available when technical issues arose. Don Olson is the very best at what he does and we are very fortunate to have him keep his eye on our business at MassCamps.com through his technical world.Ashdown Technologies is a rock solid, reliable and dependable company with a host of services to help your company succeed in our technical world. Rich Stearman created a custom online database for us that has worked flawlessly for many years and the process of working with Rich converting our ideas and needs into this database went smoothly and efficiently at a very fair price. We will always be thankful to Rich for his excellent work.If your company relies on web technology for your business success, I highly recommend contacting Ashdown Technologies – get your business running efficiently on the Ashdown Technologies track.

Mike PolakoffPresidentMassCamps.com

Ashdown Technologies has provided outstanding services for my company. They created a professional website for us (which they also host) and registered domain names so that prospective clients can easily find our company on the web. Ashdown keeps track of when the domain names will expire and asks me if I’d like to renew them so I never have to think about doing it. As a small business owner it is nice to have a company like Ashdown Tech in my corner. There are so many things to remember to do as an owner and it’s nice to know that all my web based needs are covered with one company and they are on top of it. Even though they created a powerful interactive website for us, they kept it simple so that I can easily manage the aspects of it that need my attention. I do not hesitate to recommend Ashdown Technologies….a small company with big capabilities and great service.

John S.PresidentAces High Services, Inc.

Thanks for all of your hard work in converting the website!

JamieISPE Boston

I am a very small business: I operate a one-person PR agency for clients. Many of my contacts are outside of the US. I cannot afford to be offline—and cannot rely solely on myself to keep my business online. For more than a decade I have relied on Ashdown Technologies to assure that I am always connected. When I call, any problems (and there have not been many) are resolved quickly and painlessly. I could save money by working with a larger provider, but I cannot afford to depend on anyone else.

Irv PressPrincipalPress+

Our organization has been with Ashdown for many years. Ashdown is great to work with. Ashdown created our original website and then migrated it to WordPress. They continue to support us and help maintain it. I really appreciate Ashdown’s timely and complete responses to any questions or help that we may need.

KathyAdministrationFDSOA

After brutal experiences with two high profile internet providers I got lucky and found Ashdown Technologies. I have been with them for 12 years with 2 small businesses and they have made my on-line presence a joy. When ever I had a problem they were there to help me immediately and resolve the issue. Even helping me beyond the scope of what they needed to do at times. I can’t say enough about these people.

Dot M.OwnerD & M Analysis

Working with Richard Stearman and Ashdown Technologies has been a real joy. It took me years to find someone who not only understood the technology but could communicate it simply to me and my clients.I have complete confidence in Richard’s advice and counsel – and patience. He is always willing to the take the time to walk me through my options. And the company itself has been consistently responsive to my technology needs.If you are searching for a technology or website partner, Ashdown should be on your short list. Heck, forget the list. Just call them.

Bob McCarthyOwnerMcCarthy & King Marketing

The Ashdown staff is always a pleasure to work with. They are extremely responsive to requests and take the time to translate techno-speak into English. As our needs have changed, they have assisted us in moving to the best solution for the company and our clients. The Center for Association Management, Inc. has worked with Ashdown for a very long time and truly values the relationship.

Linda KingPresidentThe Center for Association Management, Inc.

Staff members at Ashdown Technologies are always professional and very responsive and timely in addressing our requests and needs. We are pleased that we can rely on their able assistance.

BarbaraAdministrative & Facilities DirectorTri-Valley, Inc.

I’ve had the pleasure of working on projects with the folks at Ashdown Technologies for a number of years and I am always impressed with their professionalism, courtesy, responsiveness, thoroughness, and expertise. I would recommend them without hesitation not only for web site development and hosting, but also for other kinds of business programming. A top notch team.

Jan MieleOwner Miele-Fleury Graphics

We here at Mutual Oil appreciate all your help in the past few days. Thank you for going above and beyond on our behalf.

Jo & KarenMutual Oil

Ashdown has hosted our web site for what I believe to be at least 31 trouble-free years now. We have always been happy with the prompt and professional response to our questions and concerns.

Ken W.PresidentDenning Electronics

Ashdown Technologies has been our web host for over 19 years. It is a pleasure to work with them. We have never had a problem with our website being hacked or down. Website updates are done promptly and efficiently. We are ranked high on search engines. The staff are very prompt in responding to emails and they offer good suggestions on updates for our site in order to keep it fresh and current. The price for their service is also reasonable. I would highly recommend Ashdown Technologies.

Catherine PisacaneExecutive DirectorProject Smile

We’ve used Colin and his company (Ashdown Technologies) for over 21 years to provide website hosting, and to manage all our email and server needs. Anyone who lasts over 10 years in the IT field must be doing something right! Ideal for the small-to-mid size business. Friendly, quick, knowledgeable, good value.

Martin StevensonBusiness Development ManagerStannah Stairlifts Inc.

Back in 2006, at the recommendation of an attorney friend of mine, I used Ashdown Technologies to build and host a website for my private investigative business. Since then they have built a second website and also host my e-mail service. Ashdown has become my de-facto outsourced IT Department. Richard, Colin and the whole team at Ashdown have been extremely responsive to any issue, problem or question that has arisen over that time. I have found their work to be prompt, professional and practical – not to mention cost effective – which is important for a small business like mine. I heartily recommend Ashdown to any business as I believe their professionalism, customer service, quality of work and bang for the buck is second to none.

Chris MarquetCEOMarquet International, Ltd.

Central Massachusetts Agency on Aging has work with Ashdown Technologies for more than two decades. Their expertise has far outpaced any other provider we have seen. But more importantly, they have worked with us in support of our Agency’s mission to help older adults. We look to maintain a great relationship with Ashdown Technologies as we grow into the future. Thank you, Ashdown, for all you’ve done for us and our constituents!

Robert P. Dwyer, Ph.D.Executive DirectorCentral Massachusetts Agency on Aging

Good guys to work with, very professional, go out of their way to make sure things are done well and understood. I have recommended them to a number of my members…

Dave D.DirectorNECMA

I have enjoyed a long and extremely fruitful relationship with Ashdown Tech, dating back to the early 2000s when their Network Operations Center, under the name of Lightband, hosted the ProSoundWeb.com websites where I was webmaster. I co-locate my servers with Ashdown, and they provide superb tech support for my clients, including Telefunken Elektroakustik, Blackstone Valley Chamber of Commerce, Town Crier, and dozens more. They go above and beyond the call of duty with regard to server maintenance, email support, and any number of technical issues. Ashdown and Standing Stone Designs have often collaborated on site development projects, with Ashdown providing outstanding programming and development on projects ranging from the AfterFiftyLiving.com social network to database and forum integration for ProSoundWeb.com and a number of sites using WordPress as CMS (Content Management System). We are currently working on an exciting new project for Gemini Sign Letters based in Marlborough, MA utilizing a WordPress responsive theme.

Ernest BlackOwner Standing Stone Designs, Inc.
